name: Avoid direct Class inheritance from java.lang.Throwable
description: Classes should not inherit from java.lang.Throwable.
output: This report lists all Static Classes inheriting from java.lang.Throwable. It provides the following information: Class Name, Class Full Name
rationale: All Exception Subclasses from java.lang.Throwable will be runtime Exceptions and will not need to be explicitly caught by a try and catch block. This can lead to an uncaught exception.
remediation: Review the design of the Class

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling
